name: All the same
description:
A calm walking (and watching) simulator about cherishing the familiar.

Created within 48h for Ludum Dare 47 (Theme: Stuck in a loop)

I had originally planned to put some more gameplay in by adding tiny platforming levels for each “item”, but that turned out to be way out of scope for the jam. Maybe in a post-jam version :)

~ How to play ~
WASD / Arrows to move, mouse to look around and interact.
Be stuck in the loop. But keep your eyes open.

~ Tools used ~
Unity, GIMP, FL Studio, Rider, jfxr

~ Special thanks to ~

  • my (remote) co-jammer, tester and friend Flo (link to his game soon)
  • my super-buddy Danny for testing and being an all around awesome dude
  • Jule for your love, support, and (who would've thought?) testing :)

~ Timelapse ~
… coming soon …
